definition[0]: covered with rocks or made of rock
example[1]: They hurried over the rough rocky ground.
definition[1]: a relationship or situation that is rocky is difficult and may not continue or be successful
example[2]: Rangers got off to a rocky start this season.
example[3]: The company faces a rocky road ahead.
definition[2]: ( 1976) the first of a series of films in which Sylvester Stallone appears as a determined boxer called Rocky. Four more films, called Rocky II, Rocky III etc, were made about the same character.
